We can take apart $\green{7}$ to make $\pink5$ and $\blue2$.  
We can put together $\pink5$ and $\blue2$ to make $\green{7}$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$7-5=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $5=7$
